title: 820-01041-A dead
message:
I discovered short on pp2v5_NAND_SSD0,
U9080 is getting very hot under thermal camera. , I decided to remove it, the shot is still there. U8900 getting warm. 
there is still shot on pp2v5 nand.
Pls what next if there is.   Thanks

title: 820-01041-A dead
message:
Very likely U8900 is fried; apart of U9080.
We have several threads on the forum about changing NANDs.
Unfortunately, nobody left a positive feedback on the forum yet.
